document.full_text: e-textbooks are widely available at prices as much as 60 percent lower than print editions, but sales have yet to catch up. a study, however, hints at a boost for e-textbooks with the rising use of tablets.
document.title: digital textbooks slow to catch on
lines_and_colors: e-textbooks are widely available at prices as much as 60 percent lower than print editions, but sales have yet to catch up. a study, however, hints at a boost for e-textbooks with the rising use of tablets.
